name: Seraphine
subtitle: the Starry-Eyed Songstress
description: Born in Piltover to Zaunite parents, Seraphine can hear the souls of others—the world sings to her, and she sings back. Though these sounds overwhelmed her in her youth, she now draws on them for inspiration, turning the chaos into a symphony. She... See More

abilities.name: Stage Presence
abilities.description: Every third basic spell will cast twice from Seraphine. Additionally, casting spells near allies grants her bonus magic damage and range on her next basic attack.

abilities.name: High Note
abilities.description: Seraphine deals damage in an area.

abilities.name: Surround Sound
abilities.description: Seraphine Shields and Hastes nearby allies. If she is already Shielded she will Heal nearby allies as well.

abilities.name: Beat Drop
abilities.description: Seraphine deals damage and impairs the movement of enemies in a line.

skins.name: K/DA ALL OUT Seraphine Rising Star
